content.question: When Stan says, “I remember the feeling,” (line 10) it suggests that he

choices.label: witnessed Cynthia’s pride in her union card
belonged to the union as well
is one of the workers locked out of the plant
is nervous about his own financial situation

content.answer: belonged to the union as well

skill.text: Skill 1.A: Identify and describe what specific textual details reveal about a character, that character's perspective, and that character's motives.
